comments:
Using I20060704-0800, I got a ClassCastException when doing the following:

1) opened the Properties page for the org.eclipse.team.core plugin from the Packages explorer.
2) selected the Java Compiler/Javadoc page and changed the second visibility field to Protected.
3) clicked OK

eclipse.buildId=I20060704-0800
java.fullversion=J2RE 1.4.2 IBM J9 2.2 Windows XP x86-32 j9n142-20050609 (JIT enabled)
J9VM - 20050524_1738_lHdSMR
JIT  - r7_level20050518_1803
BootLoader constants: OS=win32, ARCH=x86, WS=win32, NL=en_US
Command-line arguments:  -os win32 -ws win32 -arch x86 -debug -consolelog

Error
Wed Jul 05 10:45:14 EDT 2006
java.lang.ClassCastException: org/eclipse/jdt/internal/core/JavaProject incompatible with org/eclipse/core/resources/IResource
